roleset.name: in attendance
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

example.name: both args
example.text: I am not for a law that prevents people from keeping a gun in their home although I am for safety regulations especially where-1 children are present *T*-1.

example.name: with TMP
example.text: Mother of newborn trapped in sewer was present for rescue
example.note: I know it seems kind of PRP-like, but this really only indicates that she was there at the time the rescue was going on.
example.arg: Mother of newborn trapped in sewer
